snippet: With the W.N.B.A. heavily promoting the top rookies Brittney Griner, Elena Delle Donne and Skylar Diggins, the league has seen increases in ticket sales, TV audiences and Web site traffic.
abstract: Ticket sales during WNBA regular season increased by 8.9 percent thanks to league's shift in branding and promotion, focusing on Phoenix Mercury center Brittney Griner and other top rookies; Mercury is preparing for WNBA playoff series against Los Angeles Sparks, and has led the league in new season-ticket holders, increasing ticket revenue by 35 percent.
lead_paragraph: With the W.N.B.A. heavily promoting the top rookies Brittney Griner, Elena Delle Donne and Skylar Diggins, the league has seen increases in ticket sales, TV audiences and Web site traffic.

headline.main: Griner and Other Rookies Rejuvenate W.N.B.A.
headline.print_headline:
Griner and Other Rookies
Help Rejuvenate a League
